instructions: Place the device into Airplane mode and turn on Wi-Fi. Make sure Wi-Fi Calling is set to Enabled or On . Select Gogo or the airlines Wi-Fi network. Open any Internet browser to go to the Gogo homepage Android: Automatically redirects to login. iOS: Type airborne.gogoinflight.com into your browser. Most flights will have information on how to connect in the back seat pocket. Some airlines may have a unique URL needed for the browser (for example: www.wifidelta.com). Select the T-Mobile Exclusive Pass for Unlimited Text and One Hour of Data . Tap Get Started . Enter your T-Mobile number. Enter the CAPTCHA letters and numbers in the box below it. Tap Get Wi-Fi and Texting . The Your Free Wi-Fi Starts Now screen appears to confirm you are connected. Start texting and browsing and enjoy your flight!
